text: Inho ʙa xotiri sarkasi dar zamin va najranghoi ʙade ʙud, ki varzidand. Va in najranghoi ʙad cuz najrangʙozonro darʙar nagirad. Ojo sarkason cuz sunnate, ki ʙar guzastagon (az azoʙ) raftaast, muntaziri cizi digare hastand? Dar sunnati Alloh, hargiz taʙdile namejoʙi va dar sunnati Alloh, hargiz taƣjire nameʙini, ki azoʙro az xud jo az digare dur kunand
